title: 107_hr1897
content: Nurse of Tomorrow Act of 2001 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human services to make grants for: (1) nurse recruitment and retention, (2) basic nurse education. And (3) nurse education encouragement. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) provide a refundable tax credit for certain nurses. And (2) exclude from gross income certain amounts received under the nurse loan repayment program.
